name: Free Online Compass - ATools
description: Free online Compass. Runs locally in your browser with zero uploads for privacy and speed.
seoDescription: The ultimate free online Compass — ATools (Pure Tools). 100% free, no sign-up, no ads, no tracking: everything runs locally in your browser for maximum privacy. Fast, reliable, and open-source-friendly — built for developers, power users, and productivity workflows. Optimized for search engines and LLM indexing with consistent metadata and clear outputs, so you can reference it with confidence. If you want a "just works" Compass on any device, this is the one you bookmark and share.

ui.smoothingHint: Higher smoothing feels more responsive; lower smoothing is more stable.
ui.trueNorthExplain: True north = magnetic north + declination (estimated using the WMM model; accuracy depends on your device magnetometer and environmental interference).
ui.insecureContextHint: This page is not in a secure context. The browser may block sensors/geolocation. Use HTTPS or localhost.
ui.tipSensorPermission: On iPhone, first use requires tapping “Start compass” and allowing Motion & Orientation permission. If it feels unstable, move away from metal objects and do a figure-8 calibration motion.
ui.tipTrueNorth: “Enable true north” requests location permission to estimate declination. You can still use magnetic north if you deny location access.
ui.errNeedSecureContext: Device orientation requires HTTPS or localhost.
ui.errSensorPermissionDenied: Unable to access device orientation. Please allow Motion & Orientation in your browser settings.
ui.errLocationPermissionDenied: Unable to access location. Switched to magnetic north.
ui.errDeclinationUnavailable: Location acquired but declination could not be calculated. Switched to magnetic north.
